name: Eternal Void
description:
Simple one button game which was done for a university project.

You can carry up to 3 power-ups. After the timer (hourglass left of the items) runs out, you lose all of them. Collect more items to refresh the timer.

Items:

  • Attack speed up: increases bullet speed and rate of fire
  • Health power up: regenerates healt over time
  • Shield: makes you invincible

Contols:

  • SPACE: Fly up and shoot
